General.Name: Mabwell (Shanghai) Bioscience Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Mabwell (Shanghai) Bioscience Co., Ltd., a biopharmaceutical company, engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and commercialization of biological products in China and internationally. It offers its products for auto-immune, oncology, ophthalmologic, and infectious diseases, metabolic disorders, etc. It offers JUNMAIKANG, an autoimmune Adalimumab injection. The company's pipeline of oncology products include 9MW2821 and 6MW3211 in phase II of clinical trail; 9MW2921, 9MW3811, and 7MW3711, which are in phase I of clinical trials; 9MW0321; and 8MW0511, which is in phase III trial. It also develops autoimmune products, which include 9MW1911 and 9MW3811 in phase 1 clinical trial; metabolic products include MAILISHU, and 9MW3011; ophthalmology candidates, including 9MW0813 and 9MW0211 that are in phase III; and infectious candidate 9MW1411. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Shanghai, China.
